import java.util.Scanner;
 
 class mo
{
     public static long f(long n)
    {
        if(n==0||n==1) return 1;
        
        else return n*f(n-1);
    } 
    
     public static void main (String[] args) 
    {
        long n=new Scanner(System.in).nextLong();
        
        System.out.println(f(n)+(long)java.lang.Math.pow(2,(double)n)-n);
    }
}
